title: San Sebastian Eco-Friendly Boutique Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the beauty of the Basque city of San Sebastian, on the north coast of Spain, with a stay at the boutique Hotel Arima & Spa. Pleasingly located in one of the leafiest neighbourhoods of San Sebastian, within easy reach of the pristine beaches and vibrant streets of the city centre, this Scandinavian-inspired hotel is currently ranked among the top three in the city on Tripadvisor and is part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection.

With a focus on social responsibility, low energy consumption and sustainability - and proud owner of the renowned Passivhaus design qualification - this stylish hotel is not only incredibly eco-friendly but also beautifully curated. Each of the 69 rooms boasts a minimalist design, modern furnishings made of natural materials, state-of-the-art insulation and serene views over the surrounding Miramón Forest.

Guests can enjoy a fully equipped gym, striking seasonal rooftop swimming pool and Tilia, the hotel’s relaxed restaurant offering delicious, healthy fare crafted with organic produce. Outside the hotel, the beauty of San Sebastian awaits: explore it all, from striking surf beaches to award-winning restaurants, vibrant pintxo bars and the leafy Miramón Forest.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages/nights)**

- Deluxe **daily breakfast** with organic produce and made-to-order delicacies is the perfect way to start your day
- A **welcome drink** **each** on arrival to toast your escape
- **Upgrade from a Standard Passiv room to a Superior Passiv room**, subject to availability (Standard Passiv room only, for stays of 4+ nights)

**Want to elevate your escape to another level of luxury?** Upgrade to a Suite Deluxe Passiv, an ultra-spacious sanctuary filled with natural light and complete with a large living area overlooking the forest.
offer_address: Paseo de Miramón, 162, 20014 Donostia-San Sebastian, SS, Spain
